statements: SELECT * FROM tallies
SELECT candidate_name, vote_count FROM tallies ORDER BY vote_count DESC
SELECT tally_id, candidate_name FROM tallies WHERE vote_count > 100
SELECT * FROM tallies WHERE candidate_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT candidate_name, SUM(vote_count) AS total_votes FROM tallies GROUP BY candidate_name
SELECT * FROM tallies ORDER BY vote_count DESC, candidate_name ASC;
SELECT candidate_name, SUM(vote_count) AS total_votes FROM tallies GROUP BY candidate_name HAVING SUM(vote_count) > 100;
SELECT candidate_name, MAX(vote_count) AS highest_vote_count FROM tallies;
SELECT * FROM tallies WHERE vote_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT candidate_name FROM tallies ORDER BY candidate_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT voter_name FROM voters WHERE voted_candidate_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM voters WHERE voted_candidate_id = 2;
SELECT candidate_id, candidate_name FROM candidates;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, voted_candidate_id FROM voters WHERE voter_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT voter_name, voted_candidate_id FROM voters WHERE voted_candidate_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY voter_name DESC;

SELECT voter_id, voter_name, candidate_name FROM voters INNER JOIN candidates ON voters.voted_candidate_id = candidates.candidate_id WHERE voter_id <= 100 ORDER BY candidate_name ASC, voter_name DESC;

SELECT COUNT(voter_id) AS total_voters, candidate_name FROM voters INNER JOIN candidates ON voters.voted_candidate_id = candidates.candidate_id GROUP BY candidate_name HAVING total_voters > 10 ORDER BY total_voters DESC;

SELECT voter_name, CASE WHEN voted_candidate_id IS NULL THEN 'Not Voted' ELSE candidate_name END AS vote_status FROM voters LEFT JOIN candidates ON voters.voted_candidate_id = candidates.candidate_id ORDER BY voter_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(candidate_id) AS highest_candidate_id, MIN(voter_id) AS lowest_voter_id FROM candidates, voters;
SELECT * FROM voters
SELECT voter_name, voted_candidate_id FROM voters WHERE voted_candidate_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM candidates ORDER BY candidate_name DESC
SELECT voter_name, voted_timestamp FROM voters WHERE voted_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT candidate_name, COUNT(candidate_id) AS total_votes FROM votes GROUP BY candidate_name
SELECT * FROM voters WHERE voted_candidate_id IS NULL
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM voters WHERE voted_candidate_id = 3 ORDER BY voter_name DESC
SELECT candidate_name, COUNT(candidate_id) AS votes_received FROM candidates JOIN votes ON candidates.candidate_id = votes.candidate_id GROUP BY candidate_name ORDER BY votes_received DESC

SELECT voter_name, candidate_name, vote_timestamp FROM voters JOIN votes ON voters.voter_id = votes.voter_id JOIN candidates ON votes.candidate_id = candidates.candidate_id WHERE vote_timestamp > '2022-01-01'

SELECT voter_name, candidate_name, vote_timestamp FROM voters JOIN votes ON voters.voter_id = votes.voter_id JOIN candidates ON votes.candidate_id = candidates.candidate_id WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe' AND vote_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Votes;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, vote_timestamp FROM Votes ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM Voters WHERE voter_id = 123;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM Candidates WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican';
SELECT candidate_id, SUM(total_votes) AS total_votes FROM Tallies GROUP BY candidate_id;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, vote_timestamp FROM Votes WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Candidates ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM Voters WHERE voter_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM Candidates WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic' ORDER BY candidate_name ASC;
SELECT candidate_id, SUM(total_votes) as total_votes FROM Tallies GROUP BY candidate_id HAVING total_votes > 1000;
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT name, address FROM voters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, party FROM candidates ORDER BY party DESC;
SELECT SUM(votes) AS total_votes FROM candidates;
SELECT winner_id, total_votes_received, percentage FROM final_results WHERE total_votes_received > 1000;
SELECT * FROM voters ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, party, votes FROM candidates WHERE votes > 100 ORDER BY votes DESC;
SELECT v.name AS voter_name, c.name AS candidate_name, t.total_votes AS votes_obtained FROM votes AS v JOIN candidates AS c ON v.candidate_id = c.id JOIN tallies AS t ON t.candidate_id = c.id;
SELECT candidate_id, total_votes FROM tallies WHERE total_votes > 500 ORDER BY total_votes ASC;
SELECT c.name AS candidate_name, fr.total_votes_received, fr.percentage FROM candidates c JOIN final_results fr ON c.id = fr.winner_id ORDER BY fr.total_votes_received DESC;
